name: Night. City
description:
Little birdy creature get lost on highway that leeds him nowhere but in adventure. What he could do? What he NEED to do? Those who ask - they will get an answer. So keep asking, littly birdy, The Day shall come!

Open in fullscreen

R - Restart

Arrow keys - Move&Jump

Little bit what i've got to show, currently working on it, see that work to be commented.

Hello! My name is Shviper! I am first-trying my prototype, that am making last month(maybe more) And i want some people to be in my community so............... !You Are Welcome!
